plot: In a poignant film about the difficulty of forgiving the ones you love, an adolescent boy is suddenly confronted by the return of his alcoholic, abusive father who seeks redemption.
title: Coming Home
plot_es: In a poignant film about the difficulty of forgiving the ones you love, an adolescent boy is suddenly confronted by the return of his alcoholic, abusive father who seeks redemption.
plot_en: In a poignant film about the difficulty of forgiving the ones you love, an adolescent boy is suddenly confronted by the return of his alcoholic, abusive father who seeks redemption.
